babel-desc: Yi ohia #babel dogọ́ apotin Babel tọn lọ po nugopipe lọ po nado yi ohia towe titi dogọ́ na ẹn
babel-autocreate-reason: Adà weda [[$1|Babel]] tọn to yinyin didá na ede.
babel-autocreate-text-levels: Nuyizantọ he tin to adà ehe mẹ lẹ sọgan dọ ye tindo azọ́nyinyọnẹn jẹ oba $1 mẹ gando ogbè $2 go.
babel-autocreate-text-main: Nuyizantọ he to adà ehe mẹ lẹ dohia dọ ye tindo oyọnẹn to ogbè $1 mẹ.
babel-0: Nuyizatọ ehe ma tindo oyọnẹn [[$1|depope]] gando [[$2|$3]] go (Kavi tindo nukunnumojẹnumẹ vude poun gando e go).
babel-1: Nuyizantọ ehe tindo oyọnẹn [[$1|dandan tọn]] gando [[$2|$3]] go.
babel-2: Nuyizantọ he tin oyọnẹn [[$1|adà de]] gando [[$2|$3]] go.
babel-3: Nuyizantọ ehe tindo oyọnẹn  [[$1|yinukọn]] gando [[$2|$3]] go.
babel-4: Nuyizantọ ehe tindo oyọnẹn [[$1|sẹpọ vi-jiji akọ̀]] [[$2|$3]] tọn
babel-5: Nuyizantọ ehe tindo oyọnẹn he pegan [[$1|nado sọgan wazọ́n]] to [[$2|$3]] me.
babel-N: Nuyizantọ ehe yin [[$1|ovi akọ̀]] [[$2|$3]] tọn tọn.
babel-0-n: Nuyizantọ ehe ma tindo oyọnẹn  [[$1|depope]] gando ogbè [[$2|Gungbe]] tọn go (Kavi tindo nukunnumojẹnumẹ vude poun gando e go).
babel-1-n: Nuyizantọ ehe tindo oyọnẹn [[$1|dandan tọn lẹ]] gando [[$2|Gungbe]] go.
babel-2-n: Nuyizantọ ehe tindo oyọnẹn [[$1|adà de]] gándo [[$2|Gungbe]] go.
babel-3-n: Nuyizantọ ehe tindo oyọnẹn [[$1|yinukọn]] gando [[$2|Gungbe]] go.
babel-4-n: Nuyizantọ ehe tindo oyọnẹn [[$1|sẹpọ vi-jiji akọ̀]] [[$2|Gungbe]] tọn go.
babel-5-n: Nuyizantọ ehe tindo oyọnẹn he pegan nado [[$1|sọgan wazọ́n]] to [[$2|Gungbe]] mẹ.
babel-N-n: Nuyizantọ ehe yin [[$1|ovi akọ̀]] [[$2|Gungbe]] tọn yin.
